main.name: Vinh Giang
main.description: Have strong technical in Angular, Reactjs
main.bio: My name is Vinh, I'm a Full Stack Developer (MEAN Stack). Versatile Front-end Developer with 4+ years of experience developing complex sites. Dynamic and detail-oriented Web Developer specializing in workflow logic development. Always comment on feature workflow and necessary designs. Worked closely with BA/PM/PO to get clearly requirements from customers. Passionate about building world-class web applications.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, cooperate or anything else.

resume.skillmessage: Angular 10, NgRx, RxJS, RESTful WebServices, React.js, Redux.js, Webpack, Hooks, JavaScript (ES6, TypeScript), Angular CDK drag & drop, CSS Grid Layout, CSS Flex, HTML5, CSS3, SASS, Bootstrap, Angular Material, NativeScript, Node.js, Express.js, Python 3.8, opencv-python, Yolov5x, Detection people, MSSQL Server, MySql, MongoDB, GraphQL, FireBase

work.title: Frontend Web Developer
work.description: Responsible for the entire front end of the product. Using some libraries like Angular 10, NgRx, RxJS, Angular CDK drag & drop, Angular Material, CSS Grid Layout, CSS Flex, Bootstrap...

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Building CMS website for Japanese client include grant chart and orthers.

projects.title: MERN Stack WhatsApp Clone

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Sonny Sangha must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
